get_outbreak_data()¶

Note

This is a hidden function.

outbreak_data.get_outbreak_data(endpoint, argstring, server='api.outbreak.info', auth='Bearer 0ed52bbfb6c79d1fd8e9c6f267f9b6311c885a4c4c6f037d6ab7b3a40d586ad0', collect_all=False, curr_page=0)¶

Receives raw data using outbreak API.

Parameters:

  • endpoint – directory in server the data is stored

  • argstring – feature arguments to provide to API call

  • server – Server to request from

  • auth – Auth key (defaults to acceptable state)

  • collect_all – if True, returns all data.

  • curr_page – iterator state for paging

Returns:

A request object containing the raw data
